name: Titouan-Shop
description: This project was realized during the game week at Isart Digital on the theme: "10 billion consumers". The project was done in one week with a team composed of 4 game artists, 2 programmers, a sound designer, and a game designer.  The game tells the story of Titouan who owns a shop that at the beginning only sells bananas but as time goes by, the consumers will ask him for new and even crazier objects. It's up to you to keep up.
